raw: {"customer_engagement":130,"integration_of_feedback":135,"outcome_focus":125,"overall_score":130,"comments":"The CEO demonstrates a comprehensive and systematic approach to capturing, advocating, and integrating customer feedback at all levels of the organization. The strategies include cultural embedding, structured feedback mechanisms, cross-functional teams, and data-driven KPIs, all of which indicate a high level of leadership competence. Personal engagement and leadership visibility further strengthen customer-centricity. This approach would likely result in products well-aligned to customer needs and drive significant business growth, reflecting a 'genius' level CEO performance."}
comments: The CEO demonstrates a comprehensive and systematic approach to capturing, advocating, and integrating customer feedback at all levels of the organization. The strategies include cultural embedding, structured feedback mechanisms, cross-functional teams, and data-driven KPIs, all of which indicate a high level of leadership competence. Personal engagement and leadership visibility further strengthen customer-centricity. This approach would likely result in products well-aligned to customer needs and drive significant business growth, reflecting a 'genius' level CEO performance.
